constituent: deceit, bushel basket, hamper, animal legs, eight, lack, yawn
koohiiStory1: He escaped using deceit. That is, he ran past while the guard was yawning and hid in the bushel basket.
koohiiStory2: Every day, a smuggler takes bushel baskets on donkeys across the border. But the border patrols can never arrest him for lack of evidence no matter how much they search the bushel baskets: they can´t find whatever he is smuggling. What was his deceit? He was smuggling donkeys!
